name: Guest
comment: Loved the butter chicken and the service was prompt!

name: Saanvi K.
comment: Outstanding flavors! The dal makhani and garlic naan were perfect.

name: Arnav T.
comment: Great biryani, slightly spicy for me but super aromatic.

name: Meera P.
comment: Warm service and quick delivery. Paneer tikka was a highlight!

name: Rohit S.
comment: Tasty overall, but the roti arrived a bit cold this time.

name: Aisha M.
comment: Loved the lassi! Will reorder for sure.
